attributes.action: i would like the government to educate black history to all British Schools.
attributes.additional_details:
It should be told in the full capability of teachers going in depth in the brutality that has taken place in history. 
history should be told so that the next generation can learn from it and not make the same harsh decisions that others choose to make.This shows us that we as a society need realise that we are all equal no matter the race, gender or religion.We are the ones that make society.
attributes.background: i would like the government to consider educating all students from primary to secondary schools currently on the racial injustice of black people have faced through out history and currently.This history should not  'white washed'.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/323654
